1110000011101001 0010111000100010 0 -> sum: 0000111100001011, cout: 1
1111011001000101 1101000100111010 0 -> sum: 1100011101111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
